content: on back needle begin flap make fold row row 1 rs knit row 2 ws knit row 3 knit continue in pattern row 4 rs k1 s1wyf k1 11 times k1 row 5 ws purl row 6 rs k1 k1 s1wyf 11 times k1 row 7 ws purl continue in pattern until flap measures 2 3/4 from fold row ending with a purl row bind off cut working yarn leaving tail 1 yd long on rs use sewn bind off to bind off 12 sts sew loosely to keep edge straight remove tapestry needle and using the 12th st as a starting loop crochet a chain long enough to fit around your button rethread tail onto needle and bring up through the next live stitch so that crochet chain forms a button loop continue sewn bind off on remaining sts position button placement with kindle in sleeve sew on button pattern and photographs © sharmi patel 2012 pattern for personal use only not for commercial use resale or profit
